page.title: 05COLIN'S SATURDAY
page.content: {9.00}Wake up and make a cup of tea for Mum and Dad. {9.15}I have my breakfast which is usually Weetabix or Cornflakes. {9.30}I watch "73" and "CHiPs" on t.v.{12.30}I have lunch, usually hamburgers and baked beans. {13.00}Sometimes I go with my dad to Unit Sales for wood or screws or nails or putty or paint. {16.00}I read or sometimes I can help dad with his jobs. {16.30}I go swimming at Stratford pool. {18.30 }I watch t.v. and make a cup of tea. {20.00}I go to bed and read a book till I fall asleep.
